page.title: 13HOLMSTED MANOR
page.content: Religion. Holmsted Manor, Cuckfield Rural. Holmsted Manor, on the road between Staplefield and Whitemans Green, was built in 1891 on the site of a very much older house, and has been a private residence, school and country club. Since 1976 it has been the training headquarters of Youth With A Mission, founded in America but now international,whose aim is to train young people in Christian discipleship which they may put into practice in their lives when they leave. Young people of many nationalities come here to receive Bible teaching and training in many aspects of Christian work. They take part in youth missions at home and abroad, worship and sometimes assist at services in the adjoining parish of Slaugham and teach in the Sunday School there. After their perio
